def_en: If you summon someone, you order them to come to you.

def_cn: 鼓起(勇气);振作;使出(力气)
def_en: If you summon a quality, you make a great effort to have it. For example, if you summon the courage or strength to do something, you make a great effort to be brave or strong, so that you will be able to do it.
